page.title: 08OUR TEACHERS DAY
page.content: MR KESSELL wakes up at 6.15am to get ready for school.He leaves home for school at 7.00am.He reaches school at 7.30am.He travels from NorthWood which is between Ruislip and Watford.His favourite lessons are Maths and Games. Matthew and I like Games but we are not to keen on Maths.MR KESSELL is thirty-one but looks about twenty-seven.he weighs about 10.5 stone because he does a lot of jogging. He is married his wife's name is Angela,he has not got any children or pets.MR KESSELL enjoys his job at IVER HEATH MIDDLE SCHOOL and he does not believe in a TEACHERS PET will not believe in any ghosts or superstitions.MR KESSELL enjoys eating foreign food and says school dinners are ok! By Dean Clarke and Matthew Lewis
